plurals.name: alert_dialog_exit_ecm
plurals.item: The phone has been in emergency callback mode for %s minutes. In this mode, you cannot use the required network applications. Quit now?
The phone has been in emergency callback mode for %s minute. In this mode, you cannot use the required network applications. Quit now?

plurals.name: alert_dialog_not_avaialble_in_ecm
plurals.item: In emergency callback mode, the selected operation cannot be performed. Your phone has been in this mode for %s minutes. Quit now?
In emergency callback mode, the selected operation cannot be performed. Your phone has been in this mode for %s minute. Quit now?
